texts: But I could not allow myself to take the risk. Turning my head took time and love.
You understood, but you gave me a condition.
A condition that I let you be closer to me.
You lived your days, as you have done in the past.
You invited me to your nectarine.
You let its warmth overwhelm me.
I watched you offer your neck.
I watched as your veins ran out more and more every night.
How your lips narrowed and your face grew pale.
Maybe you wished it was that easy. That you could share eternity with me after all.
